name: Walk Through 2.0
description:
W A S D to move, SPACE to jump

MUST READ:

There is no options menu, so if you do happen to press ESC,  press 1 to hide cursor again. Im working on a pause menu.

( Future updates will include a mouse sensitivity option (and a pause/option menu).

 

GOAL 1:  Find  the end by moving and jumping. 

GOAL 2: If you're bored, I have hidden a piggy somewhere so go find it. Hint: I have lost track of which walls have colliders on them.

Comment how long it took you to complete either goals :)

Also, thank you to those who helped play test.
